TopicTitle: Illuminators (lights) do not function [Flicker/Blink for a second and turn off]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win10 Pro | CPU: I9-11900K | GPU: RTX 3090 | RAM: 64GB

 

After launch of a craft, toggling the lights button for all lights or just the individual illuminator results in the illuminator blinking on briefly then off and and then ceasing to work.  This is the case for all lights in the Light group of Utility.

A simple craft to test was a MK1-3 capsule, Z-4K battery, and anything from the Light group from Utility.

Severity: medium.  Rovering in the dark is problematic
Frequency: high.  Always occurs.  Even after quick save and revert and game reload.

Edited December 29, 2023 by Spicat
I have the same issue, it can be worked around by clicking "Revert to Launch", then they work. It's rather odd.
Same experience. Something odd with the illuminators

Confirmed.  placing craft on pad... no lights.  Select Revert to launch.... lights!!

Dell XPS 8950
12 Gen i7 12700 2.10 GHz
32 GB DDR5 RAM
512GB NVMe M.2  & 2TB 7200RPM SATA
NVidia GeForce RTX 3060 Ti  8GB
Windows 11  Ver 22H2

Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Latest Update | CPU: AMD 7 5700G | GPU: RTX 3080 | RAM: 32 gb ddr3 3200mhz

All light sources such as landing wheels front lights to dome lights don't illuminate the environment or even the blinking light. It's just a gray color. It happens randomly, but when I reload the game it gets fixed, I can't find how to reproduce this.

Included Attachments:
I found that f5 f9 caused the lights to start working.

Yes, after launching directly from the VAB, lights do not work. Revert to launch will fix this.

Video: https://youtu.be/SGg0Z9hCJX0
Iv also had this happen multiple times, I didnt try any fixes

Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: win 11 | CPU: I7 | GPU: rtx 3080 | RAM: 32

When enable light they just flicks once fast and stays off.

Included Attachments:
@Jeq, merged your bug report.

Same issue. Quicksave and reload reliably fixes it for me, but results in the lights UI being in an incorrect state. I think this also might sometimes happen with landing gear.

Should be noted that the same issue doesn't happen with the interior lights of pods, which display correctly when turned on right away.

Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows 10 pro 64 | CPU: Intel core i7-8700K CPU @ 3.7 GHz | GPU: Geforce GTX 1080 Ti SC2 | RAM: 31.86 GB

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/2023208390

In this short clip, you can see me first load an earlier save in-flight, where the lights do work. I then load a new flight from the VAB and all of the non-landing-gear / non cockpit lights do not work.  They flash for a split second when "U" is first pressed, then nothing.  Do note that I removed the landing can's lights from the "U" functionality.

Included Attachments:
Also, theres no way to 'uncouple' symetry once they've been placed (ie, if you want one side to be red, and the other green), like in ksp 1. it was really useful.
@Byzantion_dockyard Merged your report into this one
